definition: perennial herb with large rounded leaves resembling a colt's foot and yellow flowers appearing before the leaves do
details:
noun
- perennial herb with large rounded leaves resembling a colt's foot and yellow flowers appearing before the leaves do
- tufted evergreen perennial herb having spikes of tiny white flowers and glossy green round to heart-shaped leaves that become coppery to maroon or purplish in fall
= synonyms: galaxy
